This function finds the greatest common denominator of the two numbers entered This function finds the least common multiple of the two numbers entered This function expects two sets and will manipulate the data of these sets, finding the union, intersection, difference, and symmetric difference This function tests the modular congruence of two numbers and returns a true or false value This function finds the number of primes less than the given number This function calculates the fraction equivalent to the decimal number that is entered This function calculates the factorial for the number that is entered This function calculates the binary equivalent to the decimal number that is entered This function calculates the hexadecimal equivalent to the number that is entered #FF000000 #FFFFFF
